text:
e="preserve">Sheldon Henry Solow (July 20, 1928 – November 17, 2020) was an American billionaire real estate developer. Solow had a net worth of $4.4 billion. He was born in New York City. He helped develop the Solow Building near Central Park.
Solow died on November 17, 2020 in New York City from lymphoma at the age of 92.
